name: A CURA DA SERPENTE (THE SERPENT CURE)
description:
For many, the snake represents the viper, the betrayal, but this thought becomes shallow if we take into account that the poison itself brings healing. This work expresses part of these processes where we see two masks symbolizing the faces of our multiple personalities, are we really what we want to be? The snake's venom almost reaches the eyes and this same snake that dissolves in the crystalline, in the quartz, in the Christ, dissolves in looks throughout the cosmos and small universes, many sensations and many learnings throughout all spheres of the quantum field, for on the other hand, nature and its evolutionary ladder, the butterfly, transformation and freedom of expression, but also the brevity of what is good.

Year: 2019-2020 | Technique: Black pen on paper

This artwork is from a limited edition of 10 prints
Printed in UltraChrome HD mineral pigment - Epson
297x420 mm Hahnemühle Museum Etching 350g
Wagner Possati - Brazil - São Paulo 2020

3508x4961pixels | .jpg | 96dpi | 11.5 MB

This art is part of a collection of 4 works released by Gallery Visionariom Art.
This NFT was generated as a gift from a physical work.
